name: UnifarmVesting
description: Unifarm Vesting Contract. A token holder contract that can release its token balance gradually like a typical vesting scheme.

eventDecorators.name: Released
eventDecorators.description: event Released emit on every release which is called by Valid Beneficiary of UFARM.

eventDecorators.name: Withdrawal
eventDecorators.description: event Withdrawal emit on every SafeWithdraw.

functionDecorators.name: allowReleaseAll
functionDecorators.description: allowReleaseAll works on special condition when there is no vesting schedule. eg Airdrop.

functionDecorators.name: beneficiaryDetails
functionDecorators.description: store beneficiary details by its address.

functionDecorators.name: cliff
functionDecorators.description: when actually token released will be start.

functionDecorators.name: doPause
functionDecorators.description: for security concern we will paused this contract.

functionDecorators.name: paused
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

functionDecorators.name: release
functionDecorators.description: Transfers vested tokens to beneficiary. function will fail when invalid or unverified beneficiary try this method external from smart contractfunction will fail on when beneficiary try to release during cliff period and vest address should be this address to check if beneficiary is from valid vest or not..beneficiary will be derived from UFARMBeneficiaryBook Contract.

functionDecorators.name: releaseAll
functionDecorators.description: Transfers vested tokens to beneficiary. function will fail when invalid or unverified beneficiary try this method external from smart contractfunction will failed on when allow release All disabled.beneficiary will be derived from UFARMBeneficiaryBook Contract.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: safeWithdraw
functionDecorators.description: safe Withdraw Vest Tokens which is called by only Owner. function will failed on insufficient contract balance.

functionDecorators.name: setBeneficiaryBook
functionDecorators.description: set UFARM Beneficiary Address. called by only Owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: unlockDuration
functionDecorators.description: linear unlocking duration. every period token released.
